title: Paper Literature Review Recommendations JDS
content: Paper with Guy Pare and Gerit Wagner on key recommendations for literature reviews accepted for publication in Journal of Decision Systems.

title: Professor M Weinstock Memorial Prize
content: Great news! I won The Professor M Weinstock Memorial Prize for the most innovative Information Systems PhD thesis of the year 2022 at UNSW.

title: Paper Digital Nomad Rhythms CNOW
content: Paper on the socio-temporal rhythms of digital nomad work accepted at the 11th International Workshop on the Changing Nature of Work.

title: Paper Zoom Fatigue ICIS
content: Paper with Blair Wang on Zoom fatigue accepted for presentation at the 42nd International Conference on Information Systems.

title: DISRUPT.SYDNEY
content: We are running Disrupt.Sydney 2022, Australia's premier disruption conference. Join us to challenge common sense, learn about new ways of thinking, and engage with our digital future(s) in fun and creative ways. Register now (with an exclusive $60 discount).

title: Launch callsforpapers.org
content: Missed another deadline for that special issue that your paper would have fit in perfectly? I've developed callsforpapers.org to help you stay on top of the latest calls for papers in the IS discipline.

title: PhD Graduation UNSW
content: PhD! I finally graduated from the UNSW Business School.

title: Lecturer University of Sydney
content: Excited to start as a lecturer (assistant professor) at The University of Sydney. Looking forward to joining an amazing team.

title: Paper Digital Nomad Legitimation ICIS
content: Paper with Dubravka Cecez-Kecmanovic, Daniel Schlagwein and Michael Cahalane on digital nomads and legitimation accepted for presentation at the 42nd International Conference on Information Systems.

title: Paper Digital Platforms For Knowledge Work Contracting Decisions ICIS
content: Paper with Gerit Wagner on contracting decisions on digital platforms accepted for presentation at the 42nd International Conference on Information Systems.

title: Paper Digital Nomad Legitimation PROS
content: Paper with Dubravka Cecez-Kecmanovic, Daniel Schlagwein and Michael Cahalane on digital nomads and legitimation accepted for presentation at the 12th International Symposium on Process Organization Studies.

title: Paper Digital Platforms For Knowledge Work JSIS
content: Paper with Gerit Wagner and Guy Pare on digital platforms for knowledge work accepted for publication in The Journal of Strategic Information Systems.

title: Paper Digital Platforms Configurations ECIS
content: Paper with Gerit Wagner on digital platforms accepted for presentation at the 29th European Conference on Information Systems.

title: Paper Scientific Impact of Literature Reviews IM
content: Paper with Gerit Wagner, Maria Roche, Guido Schryen, Alexander Benlian, Guy Pare and Mathieu Templier on the scientific impact of literature reviews accepted for publication in Information & Management.

title: Paper Ideational Impact of Literature Reviews DSS
content: Paper with Gerit Wagner, Guido Schryen and Nik Hassan on the ideational impact of literature reviews accepted for publication in Decision Support Systems.

title: Paper Digital Nomad Leadership ICIS
content: Paper with Dubravka Cecez-Kecmanovic, Michael Cahalane and Daniel Schlagwein on digital nomads and leadership accepted for presentation at the 41st International Conference on Information Systems.

title: Paper Scientific Impact of Design Science Research CAIS
content: Paper with Gerit Wagner and Guido Schryen on the scientific impact of design science research accepted for publication in Communications of the Association for Information Systems.

title: AOM OCIS DC
content: Extremely grateful to be accepted to attend the OCIS Doctoral Consortium at Academy of Management. Looking forward to inspiring faculty and enlightening discussions!

title: Paper Concept Evolution ECIS
content: Paper with Nik Hassan and Gerit Wagner on concept evolution accepted for presentation at the 28th European Conference on Information Systems

title: 7in7
content: Extremely grateful to be invited to speak about the identity of digital nomads at the 7in7 conference. Inspiring people and fantastic community!

title: Paper Digital Nomad Identity ICIS
content: Paper with Dubravka Cecez-Kecmanovic and Daniel Schlagwein on digital nomads and identity accepted for presentation at the 40th International Conference on Information Systems.

title: Paper Digital Platforms For Knowledge Work ICIS
content: Paper with Gerit Wagner on digital platforms for knowledge work accepted for presentation at the 40th International Conference on Information Systems.

title: Paper Security Vulnerability Forecasting CS
content: Paper with Emrah Yasasin, Gerit Wagner und Guido Schryen on security vulnerabilities accepted for publication by Computers & Security.

title: UNSW Business School 3MT
content: Great news! I was awarded the UNSW Business School 3MT People's Choice Award for my PhD thesis about digital work.

title: UNSW Business School Research Fair
content: Great news! I was awarded the first price of the UNSW Business School research fair with my poster on identity emergence among digital nomads.

title: Paper Crowdsourcing for Education ECIS
content: Paper with Daniel Schlagwein and Dubravka Cecez-Kecmanovic on crowdsourcing for education accepted for presentation at the 27th European Conference on Information Systems.

title: Paper Digital Nomad Identity PROS
content: Paper with Dubravka Cecez-Kecmanovic and Daniel Schlagwein on digital nomads and identity accepted for presentation at the 11th International Symposium on Process Organization Studies.

title: Paper Design Science Research ICIS
content: Paper with Gerit Wagner and Guido Schryen on design science research accepted for presentation at the 39th International Conference on Information Systems.

title: KIN Summer School
content: Extremely grateful to attend the KIN summer school 2018. Inspiring faculty and enlightening discussions!

title: Christa-Lindner Award
content: Great news! I was granted the Christa-Lindner award for my Master's thesis at the University of Regensburg.

title: Paper Scientific Impact of Literature Reviews ICIS
content: Paper with Gerit Wagner and Guido Schryen on the scientific impact of literature reviews accepted for presentation at the 38th International Conference on Information Systems.

title: PhD UNSW Business School
content: Excited to start my PhD journey at the School of Information Systems and Technology Management, UNSW Business School.

title: Scientia PhD Scholarship
content: Great news! I was awarded the prestigious Scientia PhD Scholarship to conduct my PhD studies at the University of New South Wales, Sydney.
